line.comment: * updates an array of Rearguards during the Global Alliance. These are strong enough to go after OCV capships on their own. All weaker Rearguards and all Task Forces escort them.
* 1 hunter group for every 30 sectors in the galaxy
* first we check all Rearguards with the desired strength
* we don't want too many groups because each one should be very strong

line.text: ' potential OCV hunter rearguard squadrons who meet the minimum strength of '
' so we also check weaker squadrons'

line.comment: * if not we must try again and just use the strongest that we have

sval.val: potential OCV hunter rearguard squadrons who meet the minimum strength of
so we also check weaker squadrons
updates an array of Rearguards during the Global Alliance. These are strong enough to go after OCV capships on their own. All weaker Rearguards and all Task Forces escort them.
1 hunter group for every 30 sectors in the galaxy
first we check all Rearguards with the desired strength
we don't want too many groups because each one should be very strong
if not we must try again and just use the strongest that we have
